column4: {REPEAT QUESTION FROM 06:12 -> 06:56 -> 08:06 -> 08:42 -> 09:02}: G'day from New Zealand everyone! Using Ubuntu 8.04 (LTS) but machine keeps dialing out while booting? It was doing this for months - I was not too worried at first as the unknown number it was dialling was wrong, but around the time 4/6 of my computer "log books" disappeared, it started connecting with whomever???(So now I just switch off modem power) Now my Gnome
dialler does not work? I can only get internet via "sudo pon". I would really appreciate any help.
sorry, i haven't used a modem in more than 10 years
that link might have info for you
